tool_description: An API showing all the latest currencies from official banks.
name: Exchange rates live
title: Exchange rates live

api_list.name: Get individual bank
api_list.description:
Get rates from Central banks using prefixed. 
Denmark National Bank (dkk), 
National Bank Of Poland (pln),
European Central Bank  (eur),
European Central Bank  - calculated for USD base(usd), 
Swedish Central Bank  (sek)
Feel free to contact me If you wish to add new currency rates/ banks.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://exchange-rates-live.p.rapidapi.com/rates/eur"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "exchange-rates-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://exchange-rates-live.p.rapidapi.com/rates/{bankid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "exchange-rates-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Currency Rates
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all rates from banks.
